text: Reggiolo (Guastallese: ) is a town in the province of Reggio Emilia, Emilia- Romagna, Italy. As of 31 December 2016 Reggiolo had an estimated population of 9,192. Carlo Ancelotti, the famous football manager, is a native of the town, and Formula One racer Lorenzo Bandini's funeral was held here."Mass Held For Bandini", The New York Times, May 12, 1967, Page 56. ==Twin towns== Reggiolo is twinned with: * Niardo, Italy, since 2012 ==Sources== Category:Cities and towns in Emilia-Romagna
title: Reggiolo
